description.value:
Your body dissolves, and you become a living shadow. This ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}.

At 14th level, this ability functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.6p5j2x5gjjsntyd6]{Shadow Body} instead, except you also gain DR 10/magic and become immune to poison, sneak attacks, and critical hits as if also using @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}.

You can use this ability a number of minutes per day equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.

You must be at least 7th level to choose this revelation.
